page.title: 07SHOPPING:MKT WESTON & B'HAM
page.content: Barningham & Market Weston are situated within 12 miles of 3 towns: Thetford, Diss & Bury St Edmunds all of which have a substancial number of super- markets & shops. Norwich & Ipswich are within 25 miles,so the majority of household shopping is done by visiting these main shopping areas,by car or the local coach company in Hopton which run weekly shopping trips on market days. Each village has a small general shop & post office (the latter being most important in the issuing of State bene- fits & persions).The area is well served by many mobile shops, on a daily or weekly basis, they include:bread & groceries,fresh fish from Lowestoft, greengrocery(local produce),mobile fish & chip shop,barber, Library van, daily milk, newspapers, egg deliveries - the local shops also deliver.These services are most valuable to the housebound.
